content.raw:
Your point is good. Please note that we will incorporate it as "other\_supported\_distros" while we will keep Xenial as the "reference distro" for all our pull request CI jobs so we don't need to put as many attention  or fix all the warnings. Once Artful is ready, we will change the reference platform.

Since we are building packages for zesty I prefer to have the daily CI enabled, just in case.
content.html:
Your point is good. Please note that we will incorporate it as "other_supported_distros" while we will keep Xenial as the "reference distro" for all our pull request CI jobs so we don't need to put as many attention or fix all the warnings. Once Artful is ready, we will change the reference platform.

Since we are building packages for zesty I prefer to have the daily CI enabled, just in case.
